sentence: He made his first endorsement of a primary challenger to one of the 10 GOP House members who crossed him on impeachment — former and favored aide Max Miller against incumbent Anthony Gonzalez (R-Ohio).

They've also subpoenaed Jeffrey Clark, a former DOJ official, former Trump advisors Stephen Miller and Max Miller, former White House deputy press secretary Judd Deere, former White House chief of staff Mark Meadows and former White House Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany, among others.
author: Morgan Phillips
title: GOP Rep. Jim Jordan spoke to Trump on the phone for 10 minutes on January 6, new White House records reveal

sentence: Now, the former president is currently supporting his former White House aide Max Miller in a House campaign even though Miller’s ex-girlfriend, fellow former White House staffer Stephanie Grisham, accused him of physically and emotionally abusing her.
author: Cameron Joseph
title: Trump endorsed a congressional candidate accused of abusing her stepdaughter.
Who's who: A rolling guide to the targets of the Jan. 6 committee

sentence: Six-termer Gibbs, a strong conservative who almost always supported Trump, nonetheless opted out of re-election when a new redistricting plan placed him in the same district as Max Miller, former Trump White House staffer and scion of a wealthy real estate family in Cleveland.
author: John Gizzi
title: 'Trump Factor' Key Reason for Republican Retirements From House
